        public static int getPid()
                  throws NoSuchFieldException,
                         IllegalAccessException,
                         NoSuchMethodException,

        Returns the pid of the current process. This fails on systems without process identifers.

        the processes pid

      • pidMemoryUsage

        public static String pidMemoryUsage(int pid)
                             throws IOException
        Calculates the memory usage according to ps for a given pid.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the pid, rss, and vsz for the process
